WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The radical for red and the kanji for red are the same thing!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: What a lucky ducky - as long as you know your radicals, you'll know this kanji's meaning as well!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Think of Fozzie Bear. He says "Wakka wakka wakka" a lot. Now, think of an evil, red (and I mean totally red) Fozzie Bear. He drops the "w" and just says "Aka Aka Aka," because he's totally evil.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You'll have to think of him as really, really red, though. Like, a glowing, searing kind of red. Red enough for you to associate red with this evil Fozzie Bear. If you do, then you'll be good to go (as long as you know his catch phrase as well).

humanum_full_description_en:
Oracle from " big " to " fire ", because the color of the fire is red, it will mean red. Inscriptions on gold or decorative pens, its shape has been similar to the second " fire ." "Shu Wen": "Red, southern color. From the big to the fire. All the red belongs to from the red. Lei, the ancient text from the inflammation, the soil." According to "Ancient Pottery Compilation" 3.943, superimpose " earth " under " Red " and exterior parts for the next increase, "Wen said," Ancient so-called " inflammation " is the " big ", " fire " dimorphic the Rumor, so to Xu Shen " Chi " to " red " word classical.

The oracle bone inscriptions are used as the original meaning, referring to red, such as "Collection" 29418: "Red Horse". The Oracle " Chi " can also be used as a person's name.

The inscription " Chi " is used as the original meaning, as in Qiu Weizhen: "Ju or (also) take two red tigers", which means that Bo Ju took two red tiger skins. The word "red market" is also common in bronze inscriptions. It is an ancient dress with fingers covering the knees. The dress is made of Pi Wei and is red in color. "Shuowen" " City " also goes: "Zhu Shi, the emperor, the red city." Another "Chi Jia" is a red leather shoe made of leather. Chijia" means taking Chijia as a reward. The inscription "red gold" means copper, and the tripod: "gives red gold." "Han Shu. Shihuo Zhi 2": "Gold has three classes, gold is the top, platinum is the middle, and red gold is the bottom." Yan Shigu quoted Meng Kang: "Red gold, Danyang copper." The inscription " red " can also be used as a name. .

Babies are born with many colors, so they are often called "chizi". And because the baby red body, " red " extended meaning there naked, as naked. " Chi " also derives the meaning of nothing from the baby without hair (Yan Shigu), as in "Han Feizi. "Ten Passes": "Drought in the Jin Dynasty, and red land for three years." Chen Qiyou "Ji Shi": "Jiao Hong said: "The ancients said that nothing is empty and nothing is red."" The word " deficit " then extended its pure meaning, such as Sincere and loyal.
humanum_short_description_en: From " big " to " fire ", because the fire is red, it means red.

Meaning Mnemonic
The radical for red and the kanji for red are the same thing!
What a lucky ducky - as long as you know your radicals, you'll know this kanji's meaning as well!
Reading Mnemonic
Think of Fozzie Bear. He says "Wakka wakka wakka" a lot. Now, think of an evil, red (and I mean totally red) Fozzie Bear. He drops the "w" and just says "Aka Aka Aka," because he's totally evil.
You'll have to think of him as really, really red, though. Like, a glowing, searing kind of red. Red enough for you to associate red with this evil Fozzie Bear. If you do, then you'll be good to go (as long as you know his catch phrase as well).
